nodes.text: The Damoria system was a star system located within the Colonies and the Slice regions. It was connected via the Quellor Run hyperlane to the Commenor and Chorax systems.

The Damoria system shared its name with the Damorian Manufacturing Corporation. Shortly before the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, it was the site of a civilian-operated Class IB shipyard whose output was limited to cruisers.
The Damoria system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square N-11.
